<p>The vision for providing workshop training is to equip the organizations with software tools, enrich their Business Intelligence, Data Science and Research teams with modern day software practices and tools. We currently offer onsite and remote training to employees and university students across all backgrounds in following courses.</p>

::: {.consult .grid}
::: {.training .g-col-12 .g-col-lg-4}
<img src="images/training/business-analytics.png"/>

<h5>Business Data Analysis in R</h5>

<p>The course is designed for Business Professionals to learn the fundamentals of Data Science in a Business Analytics context. The course will teach fundamentals of Data Analysis, Visualization using R and Tidy-verse packages.</p>
:::

::: {.training .g-col-12 .g-col-lg-4}
<img src="images/training/time-series.png"/>

<h5>Time Series Analysis & Forecasting</h5>

<p>The course teaches the fundamentals of Time Series Analysis and explains why specific trends in business data occur seasonally. It utilizes Timetk and tidymodels packages in R to fit and forecast time series models.</p>
:::

::: {.training .g-col-12 .g-col-lg-4}
<img src="images/training/statistical&amp;machinelearning.png"/>

<h5>Statistics & Machine Learning in R</h5>

<p>The course will utilize the tidymodels packages to extract raw data and prepare data pipelines with Feature Engineering and Hyperparameter tuning. It also teaches the fundamentals of deep learning focusing    on business use cases in Machine learning.</p>
:::

::: {.training .g-col-12 .g-col-lg-4}
<img src="images/training/spatial-analysis.png"/>

<h5>Spatial Data Analysis</h5>

<p>The course teaches the classes and methods of spatial data and how to visualize spatial data using plot, map and scale concepts. The course uses sp package for spatial objects and sf package for Simple features in Spatial Data.</p>
:::

::: {.training .g-col-12 .g-col-lg-4}
<img src="images/training/visualization&amp;shiny.png"/>

<h5>Shiny Applications</h5>

<p>The course teaches Shiny, the new shift in Data Analytics to provide interactive dashboards and advanced analytics. We teach key software engineering concepts with dashboard principles and reactivity to present your data findings in interactive manner.</p>
:::

::: {.training .g-col-12 .g-col-lg-4}
<img src="images/training/r-for-datascience.png"/>

<h5>R for Data Science</h5>

<p>The course teaches fundamentals of Data Science and Machine Learning using R. It uses tidyverse package for data wrangling, analyzing and visualizing data and teaches concepts to build robust models and deploy them through R.</p>
:::

::: {.training .g-col-12 .g-col-lg-4}
<img src="images/training/elegant-reporting.png"/>

<h5>Reporting & Presentation in Quarto</h5>

<p>The course explores the techniques to use Quarto for scientific and technical publishing of high-quality articles, reports, presentations, websites, blogs, and books in HTML, PDF, MS Word, ePub, and more.</p>
:::

::: {.training .g-col-12 .g-col-lg-4}
<img src="images/training/putting-r-in-production.png"/>

<h5>R in Production</h5>

<p>The course explores the use of R for production applications. It uses software engineering principles to organize your shiny app in a time and code efficient using renv, plumber and Docker.</p>
:::

::: {.training .g-col-12 .g-col-lg-4}
<img src="images/training/reproducible-workflows.png"/>

<h5>Reproducible Workflows</h5>

<p>Reproducibility in Research, also known as replicability and repeatability, is a major principle underpinning the scientific method. The course teaches the fundamentals of reproducible workflows and helps you do quality research that can be verified, repeated, and reproduced.</p>
:::

::: {.training .g-col-12 .g-col-lg-4}
<img src="images/training/packages.png"/>

<h5>R Package Development</h5>

<p>The course teaches the fundamentals of R Package, which can be used to replicate the data analysis and code in R. We explore the basics of Package development, testing, documentation and Maintenance of your R packages.</p>
:::
:::
